ずして: (ずして) - (attaches to the imperfective form)  without doing; not being
ずた襤褸: (ずたボロ) - in tatters; in pieces; wiped out
ずっこけ: (ずっこけ) - not the norm; foolish; stupid
ずっこける: (ずっこける) - to fall down (e.g. off a chair)/to slip down (e.g. one's eyeglasses)/to slide down; to make a fool of oneself; to whoop it up/to be on the spree/to cut loose/to mess around
ずっと: (ずうっと) - (ずーっと and ずうっと are more emphatic) continuously in some state (for a long time, distance)/throughout/all along/the whole time/all the way; much (better, etc.)/by far/far and away; far away/long ago; direct/straight
ずっと前に: (ずっとまえに) - a long time ago
ずっぽし: (ずっぽし) - (esp. when being covered in something) entirely/completely; (esp. when something is inserted or removed) cleanly/snugly
ずっぽり: (ずっぽし) - (esp. when being covered in something) entirely/completely; (esp. when something is inserted or removed) cleanly/snugly
ずっ友: (ずっとも) - (short for ずっと友達) friends forever
ずつ: (づつ) - (also written as 宛) apiece/each; at a time/piecemeal
ずとも: (ずとも) - (attaches to the imperfective form) even without doing; even without being
ずに: (ずに) - (attaches to the imperfective form)  without doing
ずには居られない: (ずにはいられない) - (after neg. verb stem) feel compelled to; can't help but feel; can't help but do
ずは: (ずは) - (after the -nai stem of a verb; ずは is now pronounced ずわ) if it is not ...; if it does not ...
ずば: (ずは) - (after the -nai stem of a verb; ずは is now pronounced ずわ) if it is not ...; if it does not ...
ずばずば言う: (ずばずばいう) - to speak one's mind; to speak very frankly
ずばっと: (ずばっと) - without hesitation/frankly (esp. speaking)/bluntly/without shilly-shallying/straight to the point/getting to the heart of the matter; cutting (forcefully, directly)/piercingly
ずばり: (ズバリ) - decisively/decidedly/boldly/once and for all/unreservedly/frankly; precisely/exactly
ずば抜ける: (ずばぬける) - to tower above the rest; to be by far the best; to be prominent; to be outstanding; to be a cut above
ずぶ焼き入れ: (ずぶやきいれ) - immersion quenching (hardening by dropping heated metal into water or oil)
ずべら: (ズベラ) - sloppy; slovenly; slipshod; negligent; loose; unkempt
ずぼっと: (ずぼっと) - something going right into or coming right out of a place where it fits snugly
ずぼら: (ズベラ) - sloppy; slovenly; slipshod; negligent; loose; unkempt
ずぼら箸: (ずぼらばし) - picking up a bowl with one's right hand which is already holding one's chopsticks (a breach of etiquette)
ずぼり: (ずぼり) - vigorously; really getting stuck into
ずまん: (ずまん) - Excuse me (coll. form of sumimasen)
ずらかる: (ずらかる) - to leave; to run away; to escape; to avoid detection after having done something; to play truant; to skedaddle
ずらずら: (ずらずら) - in succession; in an endless stream; continuing without pause or interruption
ずらっと: (ずらっと) - in a line; in a row
ずり上がる: (ずりあがる) - to creep up; to ride up
ずり上げる: (ずりあげる) - to slide up; to drag up
ずり下がる: (ずりさがる) - to slide down; to slip down
ずり山: (ずりやま) - slagheap; slag heap; pile of coal waste
ずり落ちる: (ずりおちる) - to slip down; to slide down; to glide down
ずるずる: (ずるずる) - sound or act of dragging; slowly slipping or drawing back/slithering; loose/lax/inconclusive/trailingly/dragging on; slurping/sniffling
ずる休み: (ずるやすみ) - playing hookey; being away from work without a good reason
ずる賢い: (ずるがしこい) - devious; cunning; sly; crafty
ずれ: (ずれ) - (possibly written 滑 or 滑れ) gap; slippage
ずれる: (ズレる) - to slide; to slip off; to get dislocated; to be out of alignment; to get dislodged; to deviate; to shift (position); to be out of sync.; to be slightly off; to be off-point
ずわい蟹: (ズワイガニ) - snow crab (Chionoecetes opilio); queen crab
ずんぐり: (ずんぐり) - short and stout; small but wide around
ずんぐりむっくり: (ずんぐりむっくり) - very short and stout; small but quite wide around
ずんずん: (ずんずん) - rapidly (e.g. progress, moving forward); growing visibly; quickly; steadily; by leaps and bounds
ずんと: (づんと) - much/remarkably/noticeably; not at all (with neg. verb); quickly and vigorously/unhesitatingly
ずんば: (ずは) - (after the -nai stem of a verb; ずは is now pronounced ずわ) if it is not ...; if it does not ...
ずんべら坊: (ずんべらぼう) - plain (e.g. face)/smooth; slovenly
ずんべら棒: (ずんべらぼう) - plain (e.g. face)/smooth; slovenly
ずーっと: (ずうっと) - (ずーっと and ずうっと are more emphatic) continuously in some state (for a long time, distance)/throughout/all along/the whole time/all the way; much (better, etc.)/by far/far and away; far away/long ago; direct/straight
せいの: (セイノー) - all together now!; one, two, go!; ready, set, go!; heave, ho!; oops-a-daisy
せいろ蒸し: (せいろむし) - steaming (of food) using a bamboo steamer
せえの: (セイノー) - all together now!; one, two, go!; ready, set, go!; heave, ho!; oops-a-daisy
せかせか: (せかせか) - restless; fidgety; hurriedly; agitatedly
せがむ: (せがむ) - to badger (pester) (a person to do)
せきを切ったよう: (せきをきったよう) - gushing forth; bursting out
せきを切る: (せきをきる) - to break a dam and gush forth; to burst out
せき払い: (せきばらい) - clearing one's throat; cough
せき板: (せきいた) - sheeting; sheathing board; cover
せき止める: (せきとめる) - to dam up/to hold back/to keep back/to bring to a halt/to intercept; to stem (an activity)/to check (e.g. progress)
せき立てる: (せきたてる) - to hurry (up); to press; to urge on
せこい: (せこい) - petty; small-minded; stingy; cheap (as in cheap shot, cheating, skirting the rules, etc.)
せざるを得ない: (せざるをえない) - cannot avoid doing; cannot help but (do); is compelled to do; (feel) obliged to (do); has to do
せざる得ない: (せざるえない) - cannot avoid doing; cannot help but (do); is compelled to do; (feel) obliged to (do); has to do
せしめる: (せしめる) - to cheat someone out of/to wangle; to get/to obtain
せせらぎ: (せせらぎ) - small stream/brooklet; murmuring (as of a stream)
せせら笑い: (せせらわらい) - sardonic laugh; scornful smile
せせり: (せせり) - (esp. as yakitori) chicken neck meat
せせり箸: (せせりばし) - poking one's food around using one's chopsticks; playing with one's food with one's chopsticks (a breach of etiquette)
せっかち: (せっかち) - (from 急き勝ち (haste-prone)) hasty; impatient
せっせと: (せっせと) - diligently; assiduously; industriously; beavering away
せっぱ詰まる: (せっぱつまる) - to be at one's wits' end; to be cornered; to be packed to the hilt
せっ器: (せっき) - stoneware; pottery; ceramics fired at a high temperature
せねば: (せねば) - ought to do; have to do; must do; feel obliged to
せねばならない: (せねばならぬ) - ought to do; have to do; must do; feel obliged to
せねばならぬ: (せねばならぬ) - ought to do; have to do; must do; feel obliged to
